skill.name: behaviors.skills.Damage
skill.description:
For the crowd agent, to damage a given 'intallation' object (urban block or any object). The agent moves toward the target element and damage it.
This skill failed if the crowd agent is under control. It is done if the urban block is totally destroyed.

parameter.name: quantityOfDamage
parameter.description: The quantity of damage to use to damage the installation (%).

link.name: moveTo
link.description: To enact the decision to reach the given installation.

link.name: damage
link.description: To enact the decision to damage the given installation.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once the installation is damaged.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the crowd agent is under control.
